rooms.description: A spacious lobby that transitions into an open living area with a traditional Chettinad flair featuring high ceilings and intricate woodwork.
An integrated kitchen designed for luxury living. It includes modern appliances while retaining traditional Indian design elements.
A private bedroom with attached bathroom and walk-in closet. Designed for comfort and privacy following Vastu principles.
Additional sleeping space designed for guests, incorporating traditional design elements.
A dedicated library/study area providing a quiet retreat for reading and work, integrated with natural light.
A private gym equipped with modern fitness equipment, strategically placed to ensure minimal noise disturbance to the living areas.
Complementary bathroom for guests located conveniently near the guest bedroom.
A small room dedicated to storage and housekeeping utilities, ensuring efficient functionality within the cottage.

openings.location: South facing, ensuring positive energy flow according to Vastu principles

openings.description: Large window panels in the living area and bedrooms for ample natural light and ventilation.
Traditional wooden doorways integrated throughout the design with decorative elements in keeping with Chettinad style.
